scripts.initiate: concurrently "npm i" "cd ./client && npm i" "cd ./server && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run server" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
scripts.host: npm i concurrently && concurrently "npm i" "cd ./client && npm i" "cd ./server && npm i" "cd ./server && npm run server" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
